description: This bottling shows a rich, wood-aged wine, full of ripe yellow and tropical fruits as well as rich toasty flavors. The wine is warm, rounded, spicy and with its impressive structure still developing, it has the potential to age well. The wine is named to celebrate the second Lança generation in charge at the estate. Drink from 2017.
title: Herdade Grande 2014 Gerações Colheita Seleccionada Branco White (Alentejano)

description: Verdelho and Sauvignon Blanc hangs together easily on this herb-dominant wine. The texture has a creamy character, showing green fruits, lively acidity and a bright orange-zest aftertaste.
title: Quinta do Portal 2012 Verdelho and Sauvignon Blanc White (Douro)

description: With its light prickle on the tongue, this is as fresh as possible. It's clean, packed with green and citrus fruits, and boosted with some textured richness. Drink at once.
title: Solar de Pinheiro 2012 Paço de São Lourenço White (Vinho Verde)

description: Heading nicely in the crisp and aromatic direction, this is a light and bright wine. It has a citrus flavor that is balanced by richer pear and plum fruits. The wine is ready to drink.
title: Casca Wines 2015 Bote Chardonnay-Fernão Pires-Vital White (Lisboa)

description: In a medium sweet style, the wine has a light prickle and fine citrus acidity to balance the soft freshness. It is a refreshing wine, totally drinkable immediately.
title: Messias 2015 Santola White (Vinho Verde)

description: The wine is ripe with apple and creamed pear flavors. It is warm, rich and missing acidity. There is an attractive almond and spice character to this ripe wine. Drink now.
title: Herdade Grande 2015 Audaz Branco White (Alentejano)

description: Aromas of fresh-cut hay lead to a wine that has considerable concentration and good balance from wood aging. Very citrus with pineapple touches, it finishes with an herbaceous feel. The wine comes from a vineyard planted at the end of the 19th century.
title: Maritávora 2009 Reserva Branco White (Douro)

description: A wood-aged white, spicy and ripe. It has just the right balance of acidity to go with the ripe green plum and melon fruits. With a great bite of acidity to finish, this is a wine that will age for 3–4 years.
title: Quinta do Vallado 2010 Reserva Branco White (Douro)

description: A blend of Fernão Pires and Arinto, this is totally crisp and refreshingly fruity. It is perfumed, smooth while also cut with acidity. The acidity comes from both citrus and pineapple flavors. Drink now.
title: Falua 2015 Conde Vimioso Colheita Seleccionada Branco White (Tejo)

description: A just off-dry Vinho Verde, fresh and spritzy. Acidity, sweet apples and a breezy citrus edge combine easily and lightly. Ready to drink.
title: Aveleda 2010 Praia White (Vinho Verde)

description: This blend of Alvarinho and Trajadura is initially crisp and fresh. Gradually, it broadens out into a rich wine with a blend between lemon and yellow fruits that is delicious and concentrated. This tangy wine is developing well, and is ready to drink now although it will age.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2014 Torre de Menagem Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: Ripe, fruity wine with quince and pineapple flavors, layered through with apple skin tannins. It could do with six months aging, but it will certainly be ready to drink by the fall.
title: Quinta de Ventozelo 2007 Cister da Ribeira White (Douro)

description: There is an attractive spiciness to this clean warm wine. White currants and acidity add to the approachability of a wine that is ready to drink.
title: Herdade do Esporão 2016 Defesa Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This is a delicious and ripe-fruited wine. Dominated by Fernão Pires, it has an apple-puree texture: smooth and creamy. The wine has an edge of light acidity at the end to give it a lift. Drink now.
title: DFJ Vinhos 2016 Casa do Lago Branco White (Lisboa)

description: The blend of Fernão Pires and Arinto is a classic for the region. It gives a light and perfumed wine with a creamy texture and plenty of balancing acidity. Bright and fruity, the wine has just a final tang to add crispness. Drink now.
designation: Casa Ermelinda Freitas Monte da Baía Branco
title: Wines & Winemakers 2016 Casa Ermelinda Freitas Monte da Baía Branco White (Península de Setúbal)

description: This is a soft wine with its creamy fruits assimilated into the tangy texture. There is plenty of acidity to give this wine its cool character as well as its citrus and green-apple flavors. Drink now.
title: Quinta das Arcas 2016 Arca Nova Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: Crisp, bright and fruity, this is a refreshing and ripe wine. With attractive citrus acidity and a bright aftertaste, the wine is ready to drink.
title: Adega Cooperativa de Borba 2016 Adega de Borba Branco White (Alentejo)

description: The very local Tamarez grapes make an appearance in this lemon-colored and flavored wine. It is fruity, soft and bright with acidity. Drink now.
title: Adega Cooperativa de Borba 2016 Brado Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This wine is smooth and soft, with an attractive creamy texture and light acidity. Yellow fruits and stewed pears are lifted by a mineral texture. The wine is named after the vineyard rather than after the literal Portuguese meaning of “scantily dressed.” Drink now.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2015 Pouca Roupa Branco White (Alentejano)

description: A blend of Arinto and Tamarez, this wine is light and fruity, with attractive acidity and flavors of apricots sprayed with lemons. It has a light texture and a fresh, lively aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Quinta da Lapa 2014 Selection Branco White (Tejo)

description: Grassy, green aromas give this a herbal, crisp taste. It is tight and tangy, with green fruit aromas and a fresh aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Espaço Rural 2014 Alves Vieira Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This attractive blend of Chardonnay, Arinto and Vital is fresh, fruity, packed with apple and lemon flavors and totally ready to drink. There's a great line in acidity, a crisp texture and a green, lively aftertaste.
title: Fiuza 2013 3 Castas White (Tejo)

description: Named after local nobility in the city of Borba, this is a popular brand in Portugal. In its white manifestation, the wine is soft, very clean, with pear and cinnamon flavors, the texture just moving toward fat, but working well as a food wine.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2006 Marquês de Borba White (Alentejo)

description: Crisp. dry and fruity, this wine has a light touch of citrus and fresh acidity. Fruity with a slight sparkle, it's an ideal apéritif.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2012 Azul Portugal Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is the lightest in a series of wines featuring the Avesso grape. Herbal, crisp and with plenty of acidity, it's also fruity and ready to drink.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2016 Avesso & Azal White (Vinho Verde)

description: From vines grown in the upper Douro Superior, this is crisp while also having ripe apple and apricot fruitiness. It is a lively wine, tangy with orange zest and a touch of spice. Drink now.
title: Rui Roboredo Madeira 2016 Castello d'Alba Branco White (Douro)

description: Soft, round and gentle, this has a creamed apple flavor. It has a full, ripe character, with just an edge of green herb and spice.
title: Monte Seis Reis 2010 Boa Memória Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This is a lively, off-dry wine with intense acidity to accompany its crisp apple and citrus flavors. Very fruity, it's ready to drink now. Screwcap.
title: Quinta do Portal 2011 Trevo White (Vinho Verde)

description: Light and bright, this has a crisp prickle on the tongue, along with canned grapefruit and tight apple-skin flavors. It is almost dry, which gives the wine a mineral texture that adds a bite. Drink now.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2013 QM Blue White (Vinho Verde)

description: Fresh green-apple aromas and some ripe, mango flavors, this is well rounded, showing some acidity, but more of open, fresh fruits. This is a wine that will be perfect to drink over the next few months.
title: DFJ Vinhos 2006 Monte Alentejano White (Alentejano)

description: One of the principle grapes of the Alentejo, Antão Vaz blends easily with the Arinto of neighboring Ribatejo. There is an attractive citrus element to this wood-aged wine, soft, open, but remaining fresh, the tropical fruit flavors well under control.
title: Alentex 2006 Antão Vaz-Arinto White (Alentejo)

description: This is a gentle, ripe wine that has pineapple and peach flavors and fresh fruitiness. It is smooth with balanced acidity and a zesty aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Quinta do Casal Branco 2014 Quartilho Branco White (Tejo)

description: A young, fresh blend of Arinto and Fernão Pires, the wine is fruity, light and with a crisp, bright aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Quinta do Casal Monteiro 2015 White (Tejo)

description: There is an attractive, light prickle on the tongue of this fresh, crisp and fruity wine. It is dry, tensely tangy with a green, zesty character. Drink now.
title: Wine with Spirit 2014 Seafood & Co White (Vinho Verde)

description: The wine is fruity, although with a yeasty character that leaves a bready taste. It has acidity, ripe yellow fruits and the fruitiness may come to dominate although that is not certain.
title: Cooperativa Reguengos de Monsaraz 2014 Monsaraz Branco White (Alentejo)

description: A blend of Moscatel and Arinto, this is light and thin with only the vaguest hint of citrus fruit acidity. It should be drunk now.
title: Parras Vinhos 2014 Castelo do Sulco Colheita White (Lisboa)

description: This light, bright wine comes from the north of the Vinho Verde region. It has freshly squeezed lemon juice with a touch of lime zest as well as spice. The lightest prickle on the tongue gives the wine a final lift.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2014 QM Terra Antiga White (Vinho Verde)

description: Both mineral and herbaceous, this is a crisp, taut and textured wine. It shows a tangy character, lemon zest and bright acidity. It's still too young, so drink from the end of 2015.
title: Quinta da Rede 2013 Rede Branco White (Douro)

description: This wood-aged white is richly endowed with yellow and crisp apple fruits. Balanced with the toast and spice, they give a ripe, opulent wine that is ready to drink.
title: Caves Transmontanas 2014 Vertice Grande Reserva Branco White (Douro)

description: An herbal wine, crisp and green with an attractive citrus edge. Some yellow fruits show while it is the acidity and taut mineral character that is dominant.
title: Real Companhia Velha 2010 Evel Branco White (Douro)

description: A perfumed wine with wood aging flavors over citrus. From the Vinho Verde region, it's a curious hybrid of a wine, neither crisp enough nor rich enough.
title: Casca Wines 2009 Monte Cascas Reserva Branco White (Minho)

description: A soft Vinho Verde, with white fruit flavors, only light acidity and some final sweetness. An attractive apéritif.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2010 Clemens Reserva White (Vinho Verde)

description: Named for the 14th-century English princess who married the Portuguese king, this is a soft and rounded style of Vinho Verde. It has yellow fruits, melon and pear flavors and a full texture. Drink this food-friendly wine now.
title: Casa de Vila Nova 2013 Filipa de Lencastre White (Vinho Verde)

description: A blend of Arinto and Fernão Pires gives a citrus-flavored wine that is fruity and ready to drink. There's an attractive texture of orange zest as well as pepper and spice.
title: Caves Velhas 2014 Casaleiro Reserva White (Tejo)

description: Both mineral and herbaceous, this is a crisp, taut and textured wine. It shows a tangy character, lemon zest and bright acidity. It's still too young, so drink from the end of 2015.
title: Quinta da Rede 2013 Rede Branco White (Douro)

description: Always an easy, light and fruity wine, this is full of peach and apple flavors. It is lightly textured with tangy orange zest and full of fresh, crisp acidity. The wine is ready to drink.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2014 Marquês de Borba Branco White (Alentejo)

description: Lemon and freshly squeezed lime give this attractive wine a crisp, bright texture that is rounded out at the end with perfumed flavors from the Moscatel in the blend. This fruity, textured wine needs a few more months before drinking. Drink from late 2015.
title: Duorum 2014 Tons de Duorum White (Douro)

description: A blend of Chardonnay and Arinto, this wood-aged wine is rich and packed with both toast and fruit flavors. Vanilla and apple and citrus acidity are generously pulled together by the mineral texture and ripe structure. The wine will be best from 2017.
title: Casal da Coelheira 2015 Reserva Branco White (Tejo)

description: This crisply fruity wine is primarily composed of the local Loureiro grape. It is light, bright, dry and full of citrus flavors. Drink now.
title: Vicente Faria Vinhos 2016 Animus Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: A full ripe and refreshingly fruity wine, this is full of grapefruit, apricot and ripe pear flavors. It has a touch of spice and a firmly mineral character. Drink now.
title: Campolargo 2013 Vinha do Putto Branco White (Bairrada)

description: This is an attractive, perfumed wine that is a blend of Síria, Arinto and Viognier. It's the Viognier that gives the perfumed character that makes it so distinctive. It's fruity, lightly textured and ready to drink.
title: Terras de Alter 2014 Terra d'Alter White (Alentejano)

description: This is fresh, fruity and with an attractive creamy texture. The crisp apple comes from the high-acid Rabigato grape that's softened by Viosinho and Gouveio. That makes for a balanced, light wine that is ready to drink.
title: Quinta do Crasto 2014 Crasto White (Douro)

description: This is, as always, a delicious wine. With intense green and yellow fruits that are both fresh and perfumed, it is ripe and rich. Refreshing acidity is balanced by rounded fruit flavors that carry through to the finish. Drink now.
title: Monte da Ravasqueira 2013 Reserva Branco White (Alentejano)

description: Wood aged for a year, this wine is now rich and smooth. It has the lightest touch of toast to balance the apple fresh acidity and squeezed lemon juice. The wine has a mineral, taut texture that will allow it to age longer. Drink from late 2016.
title: Fitapreta Vinhos 2013 Palpite Reserva Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This delicious blend of Alvarinho and Trajadura comes from the northern part of the Vinho Verde region. The flavors are ripe yet crisp, with notes of apple and pink grapefruit. The acidity is prominent, yet well integrated into the rich fruitiness. Drink now.
title: Provam 2014 Varanda do Conde White (Vinho Verde)

description: The second white wine of Poeira, this is all fruit. It has crisp acidity, citrus and green plum flavors along with a brilliant, steely texture. It is much too young to drink with its structure and tight character, so enjoy from late 2016.
title: Poeira 2014 Pó de Poeira White (Douro)

description: A blend of six varieties, this is a perfumed wine, with flavors of wood aging to go with the yellow fruits. and a soft, rounded mouthfeel.
title: Quinta das Maias 2010 Branco White (Dão)

description: A wood-aged wine, with the wood flavors well balanced with crisp acidity. Lemon, peach and melon flavors mellifluously combine to give a rounded wine with a tang. It shows a strong mineral-textured aftertaste, a product of the granite soil of the vineyard. Drink this richly flavored wine now.
title: Quinta de Arcossó 2011 Branco Reserva White (Trás-os-Montes)

description: Light and bright, this is a totally approachable wine, crisp and lemon scented. With a lively texture, it dances out of the glass, a wine to drink now.
title: Lemos & Van Zeller 2012 Rufo Branco White (Douro)

description: Vineyards just across the hills from the Douro have produced this ripe wine. It has fine acidity that gives freshness to the apple, peach and ripe pear fruits. The aftertaste is bright, tight with minerality and citrus. Drink now.
title: Casa do Valle 2015 Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: Viosinho and Gouveio, two classic Douro white grapes are blended in this ripe wood-aged wine. It has spice as well as rounded fruit, giving the wine a ripe character that is balanced with final citrus acidity. Drink now.
title: Casca Wines 2015 Monte Cascas Reserva White (Douro)

description: A soft and indistinct wine that is fat and has only the merest hint of fruit. It is round with some fresh acidity at the end.
title: Quinta do Cavalinho 2014 Vale das Donas White (Tejo)

description: A wine that is so soft, its texture only just brushes the palate. White fruits and lemon juice give a gentle, balanced character that is light and quite ready to drink.
designation: Serras de Azeitão Seleção do Enólogo Branco
title: Bacalhôa Wines of Portugal 2013 Serras de Azeitão Seleção do Enólogo Branco White (Península de Setúbal)

description: Apricots and peaches dominate this fresh and lively wine. It is ripe and crisp with a herbal texture. Full of up-front fruit, it can be drunk now, with its lightly perfumed aftertaste.
title: Borges 2013 Quinta da Soalheira Branco White (Douro)

description: Earthy, youthful aromas lead to a wine that's ripe while still finding its fruity character. The potential for the citrus and apricot flavors is there and should develop by mid-2015.
title: Quevedo 2013 Oscar's Branco White (Douro)

description: Soft and smooth, this is a rounded, apple and pear flavored wine. With a streak of lemon acidity at the end, it has just the right amount of freshness. Drink now.
title: Caves Aliança 2013 Alabastro Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This is a ripe yellow fruit and mango-flavored wine. It is all fruit, rich and deliciously refreshing. The 10% of Moscatel in the blend has had an enormous effect on the perfumed character of the wine. At the end, the acidity keeps it fruity and crisp.
title: Poças 2016 Coroa d'Ouro Branco White (Douro)

description: Grown in high-elevation vineyards at 1,800 feet, this crisp white is a blend of five of the familiar Douro varieties, emphasizing brightness as well as soft fruitiness. Its acidity and white stone-fruit flavors are already well integrated, giving a balanced, lightly mineral wine. Drink from 2018.
title: Quinta de Porrais 2016 Sete Vales Branco White (Douro)

description: A blend of the two major grapes of the region, Alvarinho and Loureiro, and grown at the home estate of the producer, this is delicious Vinho Verde. It is dry, crisp, light and piercingly bright, perfect either as an apéritif or with seafood. Drink now.
title: Aveleda 2016 Quinta da Aveleda White (Vinho Verde)

description: This wine is tight and mineral textured. Still young, taut and nervy, orange zest flavors are blended with apple and grapefruit acidity. There is a juicy concentration that develops in the glass and will become more dominant as the wine ages. Drink from 2017.
title: Casca Wines 2014 Monte Cascas Branco White (Douro)

description: This is a fragrant, lemon flavored wine, with a fine balance between acidity and rich apple and pear flavors. It's young, although certainly drinkable now, while it will be better from 2016.
title: Casca Wines 2014 Monte Cascas Colheita White (Douro)

description: This is an off-dry and lightly structured wine that has a crisp, mineral texture. It is bright, with citrus and apple notes that are cut by tangy lemon peel. The finish is tight and direct; drink now.
title: Casa de Vila Verde 2014 Pluma White (Vinho Verde)

description: Light, fruity and off dry, this is a fresh and crisp wine. It has sweetened lemon juice flavors that are cut by intense, young acidity. Balanced and ready to drink now.
designation: Salsus Lua Cheia em Vinhas Velhas
title: Wines & Winemakers 2014 Salsus Lua Cheia em Vinhas Velhas White (Vinho Verde)

description: Spicy and light at heart, this is a perfumed wine that the winemaker reckons will go with Asian food. Apples, a touch of green herbs and peaches abound in this refreshing, drinkable wine. Drink now.
title: DFJ Vinhos 2014 Casa do Lago Branco White (Lisboa)

description: This is a seriously wood-aged wine with a juicy character that comes as much from the French oak flavors as the fruit. It has weight and richness, with hints of the yellow fruits to come. The wine is ripe, full-bodied and needs to age. Drink from 2016.
title: Quinta da Alorna 2012 Marquesa da Alorna Reserva Branco White (Tejo)

description: This wine is produced from two of the quintas owned by Ramos-Pinto. It's fruity and crisp, packed with bright fruit and lively acidity, and finishes on tangy citrus with a riper, creamy texture. Drink from late 2017.
title: Ramos-Pinto 2015 Duas Quintas Branco White (Douro)

description: This is an attractive, soft blend of Arinto, Viosinho and Antão Vaz. With white fruit flavors and a warm, ripe texture, it's crisp, fruity and ready to drink.
title: Dona Maria-Júlio Bastos 2015 White (Alentejano)

description: This is a soft, bland wine, with light fruit flavors, a creamy texture and a final tang of lemon zest. Drink now.
title: Parras Wines 2014 Terra Grande Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This blend of Antão Vaz and Verdelho is rich and creamy with spice and green plum flavors given a boost by vanilla and ginger flavors. There's a fine perfumed aftertaste from the Verdelho.
title: Luis Duarte 2012 Rapariga da Quinta Branco White (Alentejano)

description: Grown on granite soil that is shot through with quartz, this is the epitome of a mineral, structured wine. On top of that texture, the wine has ripe lemon and green plum fruits that are full of juicy flavor. The wine is so fresh it could do with a few months aging. Drink from late 2016.
title: Rui Roboredo Madeira 2014 Beyra Reserva Quartz White (Beira Interior)

description: A fascinating blend of the local grape Maria Gomes and Chardonnay, this spicy, fragrant wine is full of ripe fruit notes and vibrant acidity. It remains light at heart despite all the complexity. It could be drunk now, but will be better from 2016.
title: Aveleda 2013 Reserva da Familia White (Bairrada)

description: This ripe wine is full of apple and pear fruit with a touch of citrus. It is full, the acidity just pointing up the richness. There are almond flavors as well as spice from the wood aging. Drink from 2018.
title: Adega Vila Real 2016 Premium White (Douro)

description: With a light prickle on the tongue, this is a fresh and fruity wine that has sweetness balanced by a citric edge. It's crisp and ready to drink.
title: Campelo 2014 Casal da Seara White (Vinho Verde)

description: Viognier and Alvarinho are not native to the Alentejo but the region's heat adds warmth and richness. This refreshing wine's acidity and citrus flavors are balanced by the ripe yellow fruit and pineapple. Partially aged in wood, it needs a few more months. Drink from 2018.
title: Monte da Ravasqueira 2015 Reserva Branco White (Alentejano)

description: Somewhat lean, this has a tart, grapefruit character that sits awkwardly with the otherwise fresh, green fruit character. Hard-edged.
title: Quinta do Casal Branco 2006 Terra de Lobos White (Ribatejano)

description: Rich, smooth, with great wafts of creaminess to go with a judicious amount of toast. White plum and pear flavors precede a finish with impressive concentration and delicious acidity.
title: Bacalhôa Wines of Portugal 2009 Catarina White (Península de Setúbal)

description: From the far north of the Vinho Verde region, the rich and creamy wine balances acidity, green plum and crisp minerality. Aromatic, elegant, fresh.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2009 Touquinheiras White (Vinho Verde)

description: A delicious citric-dominated wine, very fresh, with a great apple skin texture, bright aciidty and crisp white fruits. It dances easily, lightly, ready to drink now.
title: Companhia das Quintas 2009 Quinta do Cardo White (Beira Interior)

description: This crisp and fresh wine suggests citrus and green apple fruits. It is light, fragrant and ready to drink with its bright final acidity.
title: Quinta do Casal Branco 2013 Terra de Lobos Branco White (Tejo)

description: Soft, ripe and fruity, this is a smooth and clean wine. It has yellow fruit, pineapple and white currant flavors that give a perfumed edge. It's not a wine for aging, so drink now.
title: Herdade do Rocim 2012 Bojador Branco White (Alentejano)

description: A sweet Vinho Verde, it is light, fruity and perfect for the summer. With crisp acidity, a lively, frothy texture and a clean apple aftertaste, it can be drunk now.
title: Quinta das Arcas 2013 Arca Nova White (Vinho Verde)

description: A blend of Antão Vaz and Arinto, this is a deliciously fresh wine, lighted by acidity and with a tight texture. Drink now for summer pleasure.
title: Alente 2009 White (Alentejano)

description: Fresh and creamy, this is a smooth, rich wine. It has citrus and baked apple flavors that meld easily and fully into a fruity texture. With some weight, it also has a bright, crisp aftertaste.
title: Herdade Grande 2012 Audaz Branco White (Alentejano)

description: Pear and tangerine notes give this wine an immediately fruity character. It has bright acidity, with a fresh and crisp palate. The fruit is right up front, with a soft aftertaste.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2012 Andreza Códega do Larinho White (Douro)

description: Apple flavors dominate this attractive blend of seven grapes, including three aromatic varieties, that give the wine its perfumed character. So although it is young and with enough acidity, it is the hints of lychee and peppered pear that add interest to the wine. Drink now.
title: DFJ Vinhos 2016 Portada Winemaker's Selection Branco White (Lisboa)

description: For a Vinho Verde, this is smooth. With the a creamy texture along with bread fruit and lime flavors, the wine is soft. There is acidity to give a lift perfectly judged to keep this attractively crisp at the end. Drink now.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2016 QM Terra Antiga White (Vinho Verde)

description: A soft apple-tinged wine, with bright acidity that cuts right through. The wine is rounded, with just enough crispness. Ready to drink.
title: Falua 2010 Conde de Vimioso Colheita Seleccionada White (Tejo)

description: Blending Douro's native Viosinho and Verdelho grapes, this is ripe, wood aged and smooth. It has layers of citrus, grapefruit and white fruits, apple juice and pears. It is fruity, fresh and ready to drink.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2013 Andreza Branco White (Douro)

description: The freshest fruit is balanced with vanilla and spice flavors. Crisp apples have light, bright acidity, freshened further with lemon and lime fruitiness that leaves an open, full and generous aftertaste. The wine will be better in 2016.
title: Herdade do Rocim 2013 White (Alentejano)

description: Crisp, not quite dry, this incorporates lively, fruity Loureiro grapes with a touch of Trajadura and Arinto culled from Lima Valley vineyards. With its light squeeze of lemon and sliced apple and grapefruit flavors, it's all about freshness. Drink now.
title: Adega Cooperativa Ponte de Lima 2013 Ponte White (Vinho Verde)

description: Quinta do Carmo, formerly owned by the Rothschild family of Château Lafite, is now part of the Bacalhâo group. Perfumed and fruity, this leaps from the glass with fresh, crisp lemon and pear flavors and light minerality. Drink now.
title: Bacalhôa Wines of Portugal 2013 Quinta do Carmo Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This lightly perfumed wine is crisp and clear. Apple and pear flavors are attractively packaged in fresh acidity and an orange-peel tang. The wine is still young, with its tight aftertaste, so wait until later in 2015 to drink.
title: Casa Santos Lima 2013 Palha Canas White (Lisboa)

description: This fragrant wine has perfumed aromas and a light candy-flavored palate. It's crisp with apples, tangy with citrus, finishing with bright acidity and a fragrant aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Dona Maria-Júlio Bastos 2013 Dona Maria White (Alentejano)

description: With aromas of superripe fruit, this wood aged wine has a rich, toasty and lightly oxidized character, which in this case adds complexity. It is tangy and aromatic, with pear and citrus flavors that harmonize with the spicy wood accents. It is ready to drink.
title: 1912 Winemakers 2011 Vinhas Velhas Branco White (Douro)

description: Produced from the vines that surround the family house at Quinta da Aveleda, this is an exemplary Vinho Verde. Dry and crisp, with richness as well as freshness, it is a bright, tight and lightly mineral wine to drink now.
title: Aveleda 2014 Quinta da Aveleda Estate Bottled White (Vinho Verde)

description: Fermented in new barrels, this is a ripe, yellow fruit- and spice-flavored wine. It blends Fernão Pires, Roupeiro and Arinto, resulting in rich fruit, bright acidity and a fine, toasty character. Ready to drink.
title: Roquevale 2014 Reserva Branco White (Alentejo)

description: Long barrel-aging of many old native varieties gives this field blend a rich, ripe taste. There is an attractive touch of oxidation from the wood, giving concentrated toast and spice as well as fruit acidity. This unusual, impressive wine from the Guedes family is ready to drink now.
title: Sogrape NV Branco Especial White (Dão)

description: This super-rich wood-aged wine is ripe with tropical fruits and packed with toast flavors. It is already mature with an attractive oxidative edge from the new barrels that adds complexity to the fruitiness. It is impressive—maybe too powerful—but certainly a serious expression of what the Douro can do with white wines. Drink now.
title: Casa Ferreirinha 2012 Antónia Adelaide Ferreira White (Douro)

description: This is an attractive, perfumed wine that is a blend of Síria, Arinto and Viognier. It's the Viognier that gives the perfumed character that makes it so distinctive. It's fruity, lightly textured and ready to drink.
title: Terras de Alter 2014 Terra d'Alter White (Alentejano)

description: A wood-aged blend of Chardonnay and Arinto, this is a rich, dense wine. Ripe creamed apples and pears have intense acidity while a toasty note gives the palate a rich, full character. Drink this finely balanced wine from 2017.
title: Quinta da Lagoalva de Cima 2014 Lagoalva Reserva White (Tejo)

description: This intensely fruity wine is full of crisp acidity, lemon and lime flavors and a tangy, tight, steely texture. The wine is mineral and structured, while remaining fresh and attractively juicy. It's tempting to drink it now because of the freshness, but better wait until 2016.
title: Casa da Passarella 2013 Colheita Branco White (Dão)

description: Viosinho, more often found in the Douro, dominates this ripe and full-bodied wine. Lemon acidity is integrated into the rich yellow fruit flavors to give smoothness and roundness. The intense fruit needs to soften a little, so wait until 2016 to drink.
title: Quinta de Chocapalha 2013 Branco White (Lisboa)

description: This oak-aged blend of Malvasia, Fernão Pires and Viosinho is soft with light green and citrus fruits. There is a creamy texture as well as a touch of spice from the wood. Drink this now.
title: Adega Vila Real 2016 Reserva White (Douro)

description: This is called sweet and that's what it is. The candied sweetness is balanced by some acidity to keep the wine crisp and fruity. It will be fine as an apéritif. Drink now.
title: Aveleda NV Casal Garcia Sweet White (Vinho Verde)

description: A blend of Arinto and Antão Vaz, this is an impressively structured and concentrated wine. Ripe and flowery, with flavors of mango and yellow fruit. The smooth yet tangy structure gives pleasure now, but also promises aging. Drink until 2019.
title: Mouchão 2012 Dom Rafael Branco White (Alentejo)

description: This ripe, creamy wine contains the rare Vital in the blend. That grape gives crisp, tight acidity while the Chardonnay brings out the smoother, richer side of this balanced and fruity wine. Drink now.
title: Companhia das Quintas 2015 Quinta de Pancas Chardonnay-Arinto-Vital White (Lisboa)

description: This wine, one in a series featuring the Avesso grape, is a blend of two of the major Vinho Verde grapes. Avesso comes from the south of Vinho Verde; Loureiro is from the central section. The wine is ripe, rounded and full of apple, pear and green-plum fruits. The aftertaste is crisp and tangy.
title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2016 Avesso & Loureiro White (Vinho Verde)

description: This wood-aged wine is spicy, ripe, packed with rich yellow fruits and finished with acidity. It is beautifully balanced, the spice and toast well integrated with the fruit. Drink this still-young, tangy wine from late 2018.
title: Espaço Rural 2016 Poento Reserva Branco White (Alentejano)

description: A fresh, fruity wine that also has some richness. With flavors of peach, canned pineapple, and a touch of greener herbaceousness, it's balanced and rounded. Wait until late 2014 before drinking.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2013 Herdade de Catapereiro White (Tejo)

description: A green, herbaceous wine that has some concentration from the old vines in the blend. It has grapefruit, intense acidity and a fresh, crisp aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Quinta de Porrais 2012 White (Douro)

description: In a reference to the storks who build nests in the chimneys of the Eiffel-designed DFJ winery, Storks Landing shows bright acidity, layers of citrus plus a touch of more exotic pineapple. A blend of Fernão Pires and Chardonnay, it's fresh and light in the mouth, mineral and crisp at the end.
title: DFJ Vinhos 2013 Storks Landing White (Lisboa)

description: To judge by the weight of the bottle, this wine is meant to be taken seriously. In fact, its wood aging is the only serious thing about this attractive, dense and fruity wine. It is finely structured with yellow fruits just supported by the toastiness. Drink the wine now.
title: Duorum 2015 Colheita White (Douro)

description: It is the Verdelho that gives this wine its attractive, perfumed character. Crisp and bright with a tangy, lemon zest texture, the wine is rich. fruity and ready to drink.
title: Casal da Coelheira 2016 White (Tejo)

description: Named after the crickets, or cicadas, whose song fills the summer nights, this soft and lightly perfumed wine has citrus and apple fruit flavors, a tangy, flinty texture and plenty of acidity. Drink now.
title: Casa Santos Lima 2015 Cigarra Branco White (Lisboa)

description: Always attractive, this light and fruity wine is crisp with lemon acidity and tart green apples. There is an attractive tangy character that gives the wine extra freshness. Drink now.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2014 Vila Santa Loios Branco White (Alentejano)

description: Deliciously ripe as well as fruity, this is an opulent wine. It has a fine mineral texture as well as a lemon flavor that is given richness by mango and pineapple fruits. A touch of toastiness adds complexity.
title: Magnum Vinhos 2012 Ribeiro Santo White (Dão)

description: This herbaceous wine has a grassy character that is crispened with gooseberry and lemon grass flavors. Bright and very fresh, it's ready to drink now.
title: Félix Rocha 2012 Sauvignon Blanc and Arinto White (Lisboa)

description: The merest prickle on the tongue adds to the freshness of this crisp, clean, lightly sweet wine. Very fruity, it conveys apples and citrus, with a soft, fragrant aftertaste.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2013 Salsus White (Vinho Verde)

description: With creamy Encruzado and perfumed Malvasia in the blend, this is a deliciously full-bodied wine. There is a smoky character as well as a creamy texture. The wine is young and fruity but ready to drink, although it will be better from 2018.
title: Casa da Passarella 2016 Branco White (Dão)

description: Simaens has produced a ripe style of wine here. Apple and rich citrus flavors add a delicious touch to tropical fruit flavors. This wine is fit for drinking in the next few months.
title: Borges 2011 Quinta de Simaens White (Vinho Verde)

description: An attractively fruity wine that's easy to drink and fresh. Lemon and apples give a crisp edge, followed by a zesty, fragrant character. Drink this light wine now.
title: DFJ Vinhos 2013 Portada Winemaker's Selection Branco White (Lisboa)

description: A modern, superfresh white, as befits the Australian background of winemaker Peter Bright. It has lemon and pear fruit, attractive acidity and a zingy orange zest texture. Drink now.
title: Terra d'Alter 2010 Fado Branco White (Alentejano)

description: A bright, citrusy, crisp, off-dry Vinho Verde. It is the perfect aperitif wine with its light texture, slight fizz and a delicious lemon and grapefruit aftertaste.
title: Vinhos Norte 2010 Cruzeiro Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: The name is not a Portuguese greeting, but a blending of Alvarinho and Loureiro, the grapes in the wine. It is a rich, juicy wine full of apricot, apple and pear flavors. It has just the right amount of tangy texture and refreshing acidity. The wine is fruity, perfumed and bright.
title: Quinta de Soalheiro 2015 Allo White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a crisp, fresh and fruity wine. With its sliced apple, pink grapefruit and lemon-zest texture, it has both fruitiness and a hint of minerality from the schist of the Douro. Drink now.
title: Lemos & Van Zeller 2013 Rufo Branco White (Douro)

description: Attractive lemon-flavored citrus character with light acidity. This is a classic, creamy wine with a fresh aftertaste. A drink now wine. Screw cap.
title: Casca Wines 2009 Cape Roca Fish White (Vinho Verde)

description: A blend of Roupeiro, Perrum and Antão Vaz, this is a wine that shows how crisp and fresh (and light) whites from the hot Alentejo can be. There's simple, fresh, crisp fruit, with green plum and tropical fruit flavors, just great for chilling and drinking.
title: Cartuxa 2006 EA Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This is a friendly fruity wine that has a soft texture and bright acidity. If it does miss a sense of place, it makes up for it with citrus and white fruit flavors that are so fresh. Drink now.
title: Cartuxa 2014 EA Branco White (Alentejano)

description: A smooth and ripe wine with tropical fruits as well as more crisp apple. It is ripe wine, full in the mouth with a final perfumed acidity. Give it another six months.
title: Quinta do Casal Monteiro 2014 White (Tejo)

description: Fruity and aromatic, this blend of Fernão Pires, Arinto and Sauvignon Blanc is fresh with attractive acidity and also riper tropical fruit and pear flavors. It has a mineral texture that gives the a fine structure. Drink now.
designation: Companhia das Lezírias Herdade de Catapereiro
title: Wines & Winemakers 2014 Companhia das Lezírias Herdade de Catapereiro White (Tejo)

description: Predominantly Loureiro, this is rich, ripe wine. It has a sunny character, ripe with green plums and apples and lightly shot with acidity. It is aromatic, fresh and ready to drink.
title: Quinta da Calçada 2015 Calçada Terroir Loureiro-Alvarinho White (Vinho Verde)

description: This wood-aged Vinho Verde is a world away from the light and sweetened wines. It is rich, almost Chardonnay-like in its smooth, creamy character. At the same time, it still shows its origin in its tight acidity and a crisp aftertaste. Drink now, or better in a year.
title: Casa do Valle 2013 Grande Escolha White (Vinho Verde)

description: This wine is soft and fruity, although without great structure or sense of purpose. The finish is attractive and bright. Drink now.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2014 Vila Santa Loios Branco White (Alentejano)

description: A crisp and grassy wine, this is fresh and full of green fruit notes. It is ready to drink now, with grapefruit, gooseberry and crisp apple flavors.
title: Casa Santos Lima 2014 Lab Branco White (Lisboa)

description: Soft and ripe, this is a refreshing wine that has a dash of Moscatel in the blend to give a perfumed character. It is light in texture, very fruity and ready to drink.
title: Cooperativa Agricola de Santo Isidro de Pegoes 2014 Dona Helena Branco White (Península de Setúbal)
winery: Cooperativa Agricola de Santo Isidro de Pegoes

description: This is a soft, fruity and lightly crisp wine. It has citrus and warm yellow-fruit flavors and tangy orange peel acidity. Drink this fresh and light wine now.
title: Cortes de Cima 2014 Chaminé White (Alentejano)

description: This is a light, soft and creamy wine, with an apricot aroma and flavor, fresh acidity and an attractive fruity aftertaste. It is crisp in green apple and grapefruit notes on the finish.
title: Dão Sul 2013 Palestra Branco White (Douro)

description: Soft, with a light texture and approachable acidity, this is a bright wine that has plenty of apricot and pear flavors. The wine is fresh and ready to drink, with an orange zest finish.
title: DFJ Vinhos 2014 Portada Winemaker's Selection Branco White (Lisboa)

description: This wine is soft, a gentle meander through white fruit flavors and light acidity. It has an attractive fresh character at the end.
title: Dona Maria-Júlio Bastos 2014 Dona Maria Branco White (Alentejano)

description: One of the classic brands of Vinho Verde, this is still one of the best. It has great fruitiness and crisp acidity, only just off dry. Lemon sherbet and fresh orange zest give a delicious lift to the finish.
title: Aveleda 2014 Casal Garcia Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: The blend of Vinho Verde's two top grapes brings out great swathes of crisp acidity as well as vibrant citrus flavors. The wine is delicious while also tense with minerality. That will soften over the next few months, so drink the wine starting from late 2017.
title: Quinta de Soalheiro 2016 Allo Loureiro-Alvarinho White (Minho)

description: Flavors of ripe pear and lime juice make this wine both full in the mouth and crisp. There is an apple skin-like texture to this wine that is ready to drink.
title: Quanta Terra 2010 Terra a Terra Branco Reserva White (Douro)

description: In the full style of an Alentejo white, this is packed with flavors of tropical fruit and yellow stone fruit. Its richness is balanced by a good crisp line of citrusy acidity that yields a harmonious whole.
title: Altas Quintas 2010 Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This wood-aged wine is ripe, lightly toasty and definitely spicy. It has a creamy, rounded texture that is rich and zingy, layering acidity with citrus and yellow fruits. Drink this wine from 2017.
title: Quinta da Alorna 2015 Arinto-Chardonnay Reserva White (Tejo)

description: This wine comes from the joint venture between Quinta de la Rosa and winemaker Jorge Moreira. It is ripe yet crisp in acidity, with smooth vanilla and rich apple, citrus and spice flavors. The wine is developing still and will be ready from 2017.
title: Quinta das Bandeiras 2015 Passagem Reserva Branco White (Douro)

description: This barrel fermented wine is full-bodied and rich with ripe yellow fruit and spicy toast notes. The wine has a fine tangy edge that gives it a real lift and contrasts with the dense, vanilla and fruit finish. Drink now.
title: Roquevale 2013 Branco Reserva White (Alentejo)

description: Crisp and fruity, this is a bright wine with plenty of citrus flavors and a touch of saltiness from the ocean close to the vineyards. It has a fine tang, zesty orange and lemon and forward acidity. Drink now.
title: Bacalhôa Wines of Portugal 2016 Meia Pipa Private Selection Verdelho-Viosinho White (Península de Setúbal)

description: Delicately perfumed, yellow and tropical-fruit flavored, this is bright and very fruity. The citrus edge adds a further lift to this refreshing, ready-to-drink wine.
title: Casa Cadaval 2015 Vinha Padre Pedro Branco White (Tejo)

description: A creamy textured, citrus-flavored wine that is ripe and smooth. It has a crisp fresh character with its lemon and ripe melon fruit and bright acidity. The aftertaste continues the crisp, fruity theme.
title: Cooperativa Agricola de Santo Isidro de Pegoes 2015 Adega de Pegões Colheita Seleccionada White (Península de Setúbal)
winery: Cooperativa Agricola de Santo Isidro de Pegoes

description: This is a smooth, clean, attractive wine that is bright and crisp. Lemon and pink grapefruit give the fine fruitiness while the acidity and lightly mineral texture add the structure. Drink now.
title: Terras de Alter 2015 Terra d'Alter Síria-Arinto-Viognier White (Alentejano)

description: Smooth, rounded wine, with vanilla, ripe pear and a bitter herbal finish. The wine feels fat, unfocused.
title: Borges 2010 Lello Branco White (Douro)

description: Ripe and fruity, with some sweetness that does not seem to be fully integrated. So the green plum flavors are attractive, as is the acidity, but there is an intrusive sugary edge.
title: DFJ Vinhos 2010 Segada Branco White (Lisboa)

description: The wine has strongly catty aromas that seems to dissipate on the palate. A tense, mineral-driven acidity carries gooseberry flavors and a herbal aftertaste. Drink now.
title: João Teodosio Matos Barbosa 2013 Ninfa Escolha White (Tejo)

description: Produced from high altitude vineyards to retain acidity, this is a fruity, crisp and bright wine. It has an herbal character along with lively lemon and quince flavors. The wine is ready to drink.
title: Real Companhia Velha 2014 Evel Branco White (Douro)

description: Fresh and fruity, this is a blend of local white grapes with Sauvignon Blanc is light-bodied and crisp. Full of citrus and herbal flavors, this is an easy wine to enjoy. Drink now.
title: Companhia das Quintas 2014 Forgotten Field White (Lisboa)

description: This blend of local Douro white grapes with, unusually, Chenin Blanc, is delicious. With its wood-aged touch and rich creamy texture, the wine is generous and full. It has attractive acidity as well, emphasizing the apple and grapefruit fruit. The wine will be even better from 2018.
title: Colinas do Douro 2015 Reserva Branco White (Douro)

description: This is a ripe, lemon and orange zest-driven wine. It has a lightly mineral texture that gives structure as well as a cool feel. It's a delicious wine already but will be better by late 2014.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2013 Marquês de Borba Branco White (Alentejo)

description: Fresh and fruity, the wine is attractive, citrus-driven and light. It has a zesty character that zings through the palate. Drink now.
title: Adega Mãe 2014 Pinta Negra Branco White (Lisboa)

description: Named after the Knights Templar who were headquartered in the Tejo region of Portugal in the Middle Ages, this estate has produced a fruity, soft and rounded white wine. It has an attractively aromatic character from the inclusion of Riesling and Moscatel in the blend. Wait until the end of 2015 before drinking.
title: Quinta do Cavalinho 2014 Herdade dos Templários Branco White (Tejo)

description: Wood aging gives this ripe wine its toasty character. This texture is balanced by rich peach and apricot fruits, rounded and fruity. Old vines bring an extra concentration to this full, generous wine. Drink from 2016.
title: Quinta de Porrais 2012 Reserva Branco White (Douro)

description: With Anselmo Mendes, the Vinho Verde master, as consultant, this is a coastal Lisboa wine that has plenty of the crisp texture that comes from the Alvarinho in the blend. There is a perfumed touch from Viognier, giving the wine crispness as well as a rich background. Drink this wine from 2018.
title: Adega Mãe 2016 Dory White (Lisboa)

description: This blend of Arinto and Chardonnay is crisp and fresh, showing the cool, ocean climate of the Lisboa region in its light, bright texture. It is juicy with peach and pineapple flavors cut by lime-juice acidity. Drink now.
title: Companhia das Quintas 2014 Quinta de Pancas Branco White (Lisboa)

description: Large French oak barrels were used to ferment this toasty, ripe wine, which boasts notes of stone fruit and citrus. A mix of cool-climate Portuguese grapes and Chardonnay, it will smooth out and become rich and complex with time; drink after 2016.
title: Adega Mãe 2013 Dory Reserva White (Lisboa)

description: This is a soft, tropical-fruit flavored wine. It has a tangy, mineral texture that cuts through the riper fruitiness to give a wine that is easy and very drinkable now.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2015 Loios White (Alentejano)

description: A ripe and soft blend of Portuguese grapes with a touch of Viognier, this is a smooth, creamy textured wine. The acidity is just right to give the wine its tight, steely aftertaste. Drink now.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2015 Marquês de Borba White (Alentejo)

description: This is a fruity, soft wine with a light texture and plenty of citrus fruits. It is crisp, clean with a hint of perfumes and a herbal edge that comes from the Sauvignon Blanc in the blend. The wine is ready to drink.
title: Quinta da Lagoalva de Cima 2015 TalhãoI White (Tejo)

description: This producer, firmly established in Vinho Verde and the Douro, also has vineyards at Quinta da Aguieira in the central coastal region of Bairrada. A blend of local white grapes along with some Chardonnay, this wine is ripe, with a touch of saltiness and minerality, plus plenty of concentration from old vines. With its rich texture and crisp aftertaste, this is ready to drink.
title: Aveleda 2015 Reserva da Familia Branco White (Bairrada)

description: A rare, maybe unique, blend of Arinto and Sauvignon Blanc, which imparts a curiously mineral character. The fresh character of both grape varieties seem lost in the rounded character of the wine.
designation: Casa de Santar Terras do Dão
title: Dão Sul 2010 Casa de Santar Terras do Dão White (Dão)

description: A fruity, fresh and crisp wine, this is given some weight by the inclusion of Chardonnay in the blend. It has an attractive texture, and the lemon and grapefruit flavors dominate.
title: Herdade dos Templários 2011 Vale das Donas Branco White (Tejo)

description: It is the Fernão Pires that gives this wine its class and freshness. The Sauvignon Blanc in the blend, with its herbaceous character, seems to clash. The wine is crisp with lemon flavors and brings an intense final acidity.
title: Quinta do Casal Branco 2014 Terra de Lobos Branco White (Tejo)

description: This is a lively, fruity wine, crisp as can be, and finely textured. Drink now for its bright, fresh character.
title: Caves Velhas 2013 Cabeça de Toiro Reserva White (Tejo)

description: Refreshing and crisp, this is a light, citrus-flavored wine. Great shots of acidity course through the wine to give an intensely fresh and fragrant aftertaste.
title: Quinta do Casal Monteiro 2013 White (Tejo)

description: This is a deliciously fruity wine with tropical fruit tones, a light mineral texture and fine, crisp acidity. From vines planted at 1500 feet above the river, it is fresh, cool and ready to drink.
title: Companhia das Quintas 2014 Fronteira Branco White (Douro)

description: Fresh, crisp and fruity, this is a citrus and apple-flavored medium-dry wine. With plenty of acidity, bright and packed with easy fruitiness, the wine is ready to drink.
title: Aveleda NV Casal Garcia Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: With its apricot and ripe pear aromas, this is a full and rounded wine. It has a good balance between acidity and ripe fruit. It is floral, smooth and ready to drink.
title: Casa Cadaval 2012 Vinha Padre Pedro White (Tejo)

description: Crisp apples, touched with some sweetness, but finely clean and fresh, this is a great apéritif style of Vinho Verde, finishing with just a sparkle. Screwcap.
title: José Maria da Fonseca 2006 Twin Vines White (Vinho Verde)

description: A full wine, balanced with an attractive citrus character and some creamy texture. There is also an edge of tannin that makes it a good, fresh, food wine.
title: Poças 2006 Coroa D'ouro Reserva White (Douro)

description: A full-bodied wine, with acidity and ripe white fruits. It is soft, lightly sweetened and easy to drink.
title: José Maria da Fonseca 2006 Periquita White (Terras do Sado)

description: This is a soft, fruity blend of Roupeiro, Rabo de Ovelha and Fernão Pires. It is ripe, full of apple and crisp green fruits, shot through with acidity. Drink now.
title: Adega Cooperativa de Borba 2016 Convento da Vila White (Alentejano)

description: The short lees aging has allowed this wine to ripen and fill out. Along with the citrus acidity, it has plenty of fresh apple fruit and a zesty texture. Drink now.
title: Casca Wines 2016 Monte Cascas Colheita Branco White (Douro)

description: This wine that includes 65% Antão Vaz conjures up a warm, ripe character from the Alentejo. With its yellow fruits and almond flavors, it's soft although finished with some attractive acidity. Drink now.
title: Casca Wines 2016 Monte Cascas Colheita Branco White (Alentejano)

description: Fresh and perfumed, this wine offers great citric flavors, a lively crispness rare in white wines from central Portugal. Pear and some yellow fruits give roundness.
title: Quinta da Alorna 2006 White (Ribatejo)

description: This oak-aged wine is rich and intense. It is a ripe blend of Arinto and Viognier, with a pinch of Chardonnay. Together they give the wine its perfumed character, spiced and with a beautiful streak of acidity. Although ready to drink, the wine is young and will be better from 2018.
title: Herdade da Malhadinha Nova 2015 Maladinha Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This is a ripe, smooth blend of Alvarinho and Chardonnay. The two complement each other well with yellow fruits touched by a more citrus edge and a rich character. It is fruity, full-bodied and ready to drink.
title: DFJ Vinhos 2015 Point West White (Lisboa)

description: This young, citrus flavored wine is crisp and still with its yeasty and fruity flavors. The wine is fresh and ready to drink.
title: Quinta do Casal Branco 2015 Lobo e Falcão (Wolf and Falcon) White (Tejo)

description: The Vila Santa Reserva boasts wood aging as well as lush, rich fruitiness. The touch of woody spice emphasizes the green- and white-fruits that give this rounded wine a full texture. There is a plush feel that promises some aging, although the wine can be enjoyed now.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2012 Vila Santa Branco Reserva White (Alentejano)

description: The Aveleda estate is the source of the fruit for this dry, delicious Vinho Verde. It's a reference for the food-friendly, lemon and grapefruit style, adding minerality and a taut texture to the forward fruitiness. Drink this summer, or hold for up to six months.
title: Aveleda 2012 Quinta da Aveleda Estate Bottled White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a highly perfumed, fruity wine with ripe melon and spiced apple flavors. It is crisp, tangy and attractively textured with fine acidity. Drink now.
title: Solar de Cambres 2015 Casa de Cambres Colheita Branco White (Douro)

description: A ripe, smooth wine made mainly from Viosinho and Gouveio, this is creamy-textured, rich with yellow fruits. It is cut by crisper acidity and a delicious, refreshing lemon-curd flavor. Drink now.
title: Quevedo 2016 Oscar's White White (Douro)

description: This delicious and refreshing wine comes from the plateau above the Douro Valley, giving it a cool character along with a mineral and spice texture. The wine is perfumed from the 20% Moscatel in the blend. Drink now.
title: Real Companhia Velha 2016 Porca de Murça Branco White (Douro)

description: With a touch of wood aging, this is a bright yet toasty wine. Its fruitiness shows as citrus, pineapple and pear, with a tangy edge. There is aging potential here, to round out the wine and bring out its softer side. Drink from 2015.
title: Herdade de São Miguel 2013 Colheita Seleccionada Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This wine is all about fruit. It is dry and so fresh and crisp with apple and green pear flavors. There is a light prickle there that adds a dancing lightness to this refreshing wine.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2015 QM Terra Antiga White (Vinho Verde)

description: A blend of four grapes, including Sauvignon Blanc and Viognier, the white Chaminé has a full feel to it. An open oily texture also preserves herbaceous crispness and a final burst of acidity.
title: Cortes de Cima 2010 Chaminé White (Alentejano)

description: The white and red Pêra-Manca are cult wines in Portugal, only released in the best years. The white has partial barrel fermentation, giving great richness and depth of flavor, as well as smooth toastiness. With its high proportion of Antâo Vaz, it is very white Burgundy in its richness and sense of mineral terroir. Delicious acidity rounds the wine out.
title: Cartuxa 2005 Pêra-Manca White (Alentejo)

description: Soft, full-bodied wine. It has an oily, smooth sheen, with the flavors of pear and apricot just leavened by acidity. This is certainly a warm-climate white, designed for food rather than apéritif.
title: Cortes de Cima 2007 Chaminé White (Alentejano)

description: A blend of Arinto and Alvarinho, this is a fresh and crisp wine that also has a richer side to it. Produced in the same region as Vinho Verde, it is bone dry, full of apple and kiwi fruit flavors within a tight, tangy texture. Drink now.
title: Casca Wines 2012 Monte Cascas Reserva White (Minho)

description: A blend of Viognier and Arinto, this wine is given another dimension from wood aging. A smoky character adds complexity to ripe apricot and crisp quince flavors. This is juicy and rich while having a refreshing aftertaste.
title: Casa Cadaval 2013 Padre Pedro Reserva Branco White (Tejo)

description: This is a fruity wine with a off-dry character that is balanced by lime and lemon fruitiness. The acidity and the tangy herbal character give the wine an attractive bite. Drink now.
title: Caves Velhas NV Lagosta White (Vinho Verde)

description: The wine is attractive with its ripe apple flavors and shot of lemon. It is off dry, with a fruity character that makes it a great apéritif wine. Drink now.
title: Enoport 2016 Vinhas Altas White (Vinho Verde)

description: There is a crisp spring in this wine— light and bright with great acidity and a touch of sweetness. It has a light prickle on the tongue that adds to the liveliness of this attractive wine.
title: Casca Wines 2016 Bote Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: A blend of Arinto and Fernão Pires, this is light and crisply refreshing. There are some yellow fruit flavors that contrast with the lime acidity. It is ready to drink now.
title: Adega Mãe 2015 Pinta Negra Branco White (Lisboa)

description: This ripe perfumed wine is soft with attractive melon and kiwi fruit flavors. It is gently textured, spicy and with just enough acidity. There is a touch of pepper at the end.
designation: Companhia das Lezírias Herdade de Catapereiro Single Vineyard Escolha
title: Wines & Winemakers 2014 Companhia das Lezírias Herdade de Catapereiro Single Vineyard Escolha White (Tejo)

description: This is classic, off-dry Vinho Verde. With its light prickle, crisp fruit that has a tangy lime and lemon character that comes through the candy flavor, it is a refreshing, light wine.
title: Aveleda 2015 Casal Garcia White (Vinho Verde)

description: With its apricot and ripe pear aromas, this is a full and rounded wine. It has a good balance between acidity and ripe fruit. It is floral, smooth and ready to drink.
title: Casa Cadaval 2012 Vinha Padre Pedro White (Tejo)

description: Fresh and creamy, this is a smooth, rich wine. It has citrus and baked apple flavors that meld easily and fully into a fruity texture. With some weight, it also has a bright, crisp aftertaste.
title: Herdade Grande 2012 Audaz Branco White (Alentejano)

description: Apples, green plums and peaches go with lemon zest acidity in this soft, fruity white wine. It is ready for drinking, finishing with an attractive warm finish.
title: Quinta do Pinto 2010 Vinhas do Lasso Branco White (Lisboa)

description: Blending Chardonnay and Arinto, this wine has come with a fine balance between a creamy texture and bright acidity. It is ripe, fruity with a soft character that also has an aromatic element. Drink the wine from 2018.
title: Quinta do Casal Monteiro 2016 Margaride's White (Lisboa)

description: Just as the wine's label suggests, this is a wine born under the sun. It is full and rich in superripe fruit tempered by ample acidity. Wood aging gives spice and a slightly burnt character that needs more time to fully integrate. The finish remains ripe, spicy and full of great acidity; hold until 2016.
title: Herdade do Esporão 2013 Esporão Reserva White (Alentejo)

description: Very lemony, this is a crisp citrus- and peach-flavored wine. It has delicious, refreshing fruitiness that contrasts with a softer, rounded texture.  For drinking now and until 2018.
title: Quinta da Alorna 2012 Portal da Aguia Branco White (Tejo)

description: Bright and fruity, this has a good balance of lemon and ripe pear flavors. It is a light wine, crisp but with a richer seam that gives it concentration. A great apéritif wine, it's ready to drink.
title: Lavradores de Feitoria 2015 Três Bagos White (Douro)

description: Apple and spice give this wine a bright as well as subtle character. Citrus acidity combines with a tangy, zesty texture. It still needs to age, so drink from 2015.
title: Ramos-Pinto 2012 Duas Quintas Reserva Branco White (Douro)

description: A rich, fruity wine from the north of Portugal. It has creamy apple and citrus flavors, a light and mineral texture and bright acidity. Drink now.
title: Sousa Lopes 2012 Seleção do Enôlogo White (Portuguese Table Wine)

description: The Chardonnay in this blend dominates, giving a rich, generous feel to the wine, full of ripe plum and peach flavors. The Arinto provides fresh acidity that is behind the warm fruits. Full and generous, it is a wine that needs to age; drink from the end of 2016.
title: Quinta do Casal Monteiro 2014 Margaride's White (Tejo)

description: Delicately perfumed, yellow and tropical-fruit flavored, this is bright and very fruity. The citrus edge adds a further lift to this refreshing, ready-to-drink wine.
title: Casa Cadaval 2015 Vinha Padre Pedro Branco White (Tejo)

description: A creamy textured, citrus-flavored wine that is ripe and smooth. It has a crisp fresh character with its lemon and ripe melon fruit and bright acidity. The aftertaste continues the crisp, fruity theme.
title: Cooperativa Agricola de Santo Isidro de Pegoes 2015 Adega de Pegões Colheita Seleccionada White (Península de Setúbal)
winery: Cooperativa Agricola de Santo Isidro de Pegoes

description: This is a smooth, clean, attractive wine that is bright and crisp. Lemon and pink grapefruit give the fine fruitiness while the acidity and lightly mineral texture add the structure. Drink now.
title: Terras de Alter 2015 Terra d'Alter Síria-Arinto-Viognier White (Alentejano)

description: With attractive wood aging and lemon flavors, this is a delicious, rich wine. It needs a couple of years, while already developing well. Acidity enlivens green plum and red apple flavors.
title: Quinta de Chocapalha 2009 Chocapalha Reserva Branco White (Lisboa)

description: A sugar water style of Vinho Verde, all sweetness and acidity. It is fresh and clean, very crisp and green.
title: Vidigal 2013 White (Vinho Verde)

description: The entry-level white wine from this young Douro estate is ripe, juicy with tropical fruits and a lightly oxidative character that gives it extra richness. The wine has plenty of acidity as well as citrus crispness. It finishes with a creamy texture. Drink now.
title: Quinta do Pôpa 2016 Contos da Terra White (Douro)

description: This blend of Encruzado and Malvasia Fina is both rich and perfumed. It has a smooth texture that is pointed up by apple and lemon acidity. There is a floral character to the bouquet, while the mouthfeel is ripe and full. The finish, with its textured acidity, promises aging, so drink from 2016.
title: Magnum Vinhos 2014 Jardim da Estrela Branco White (Dão)

description: This is an attractively perfumed wine with Malvasia Fina and Verdelho in the blend. It is tangy, crisp and with a lightly mineral texture. Drink this wine now.
title: Casa da Passarella 2015 Somontes Colheita Branco White (Dão)

description: Reserva in the case of this wine means both a selection of wines and also aging in wood. That gives this ripe wine full spice as well as apricot flavors. It is a creamy, rounded wine, just lit by acidity at the end. Drink from 2018.
title: Casa de Cambres 2016 Reserva Branco White (Douro)

description: With bright lemon freshness, this wine positively zings through its ripe melon and pineapple flavors. The balance here between the acidity and richness gives a delicious tension.
title: Quinta da Sequeira 2010 Branco White (Douro)

description: Arinto and Antão Vaz are blended to create this crisp, bright wine. It also shows a creamy side, and it offers touches of vanilla, quince and pear. Ready to drink.
title: Julian Reynolds 2011 Branco Real White (Alentejano)

description: A superripe, soft wine, all pear and yellow fruit flavors, touched with apricot juice and light honey and lemon. The wine rolls smoothly with a light texture of pear skins.
title: Fitapreta Vinhos 2008 Sexy Branco White (Alentejano)

description: The Estremadura region, north of Lisbon, is at the western extremity of mainland Europe. It produces a good line in this style of fresh, crisp wines, light and bright. There is just a hint of sweetness, with currant flavors and a final softness.
title: DFJ Vinhos 2008 Point West White (Estremadura)

description: With attractive wood aging and lemon flavors, this is a delicious, rich wine. It needs a couple of years, while already developing well. Acidity enlivens green plum and red apple flavors.
title: Quinta de Chocapalha 2009 Chocapalha Reserva Branco White (Lisboa)

description: This is a typically light, fruity and off dry Vinho Verde. It has an attractive, refreshing prickle on the tongue followed by crisp apples and citrus flavors. Clean, fresh and ready to drink.
title: Dão Sul 2013 Xadrez White (Vinho Verde)

description: An herbaceous, youthful wine that can be drunk immediately for its fresh, crisp fruits. It's light and bright.
title: Casa Cadaval 2013 Vinha Padre Pedro Branco White (Tejo)

description: This is a really rich manifestation of Arinto. Its ripe pear and apricot flavors are laced with wood fermentation and aging toastiness. Its dense texture comes from the grape selection, while its richness comes from the sandy soil of the vineyard. It is a fine wine, likely ready to drink from 2018.
title: Falua 2015 Conde Vimioso Reserva Branco White (Tejo)

description: A crisp blend of six grapes, the wine is fruity with lemon, grapefruit backed by intense acidity. It has a light tang of texture and a crisp bright character that makes a wine that is ready to drink now.
title: Quinta da Lagoalva de Cima 2016 Lagoalva Vinho Branco White (Tejo)

description: Lightly fizzy, this young fruity wine is an easygoing Vinho Verde. It is just off dry, giving a soft character to the lively fruit, citrus and floral wine. It is ready to drink.
title: Santos & Seixo NV Rotas de Portugal Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: The vineyard is named for a 16th century archbishop whose jurisdiction in the Age of Discovery covered all lands discovered and to be discovered. This wine is soft with pear and peach fruit and light acidity. It is balanced and warm, its creamy texture giving an attractive roundness and smoothness. The wine is ready to drink.
designation: Dom Martinho by Quinta do Carmo
title: Bacalhôa Wines of Portugal 2016 Dom Martinho by Quinta do Carmo White (Alentejano)

description: Grassy, herbaceous wine, with citrus and gooseberry fruits and a refreshing tang of acidity. It is light to feel, bursting with fresh fruits, very crisp and green.
title: Quinta de la Rosa 2010 Dourosa Branco White (Douro)

description: A rich, spicy wood-aged wine, this has as much vanilla as fruit. That gives a strongly toasty character to the wine that needs to soften to bring out the green plum and melon flavors and the acidity. It's obviously a ripe wine, leaving a pepper character from the alcohol at the end.
title: Roquevale 2011 Reserva White (Alentejano)

description: Full and rounded, the wine is rich and smooth, cut with acidity and a steely, mineral texture. With Arinto, Vital and Viosinho in the blend, pineapple and peach flavors are dominant and ripe. It's a full-bodied wine that is ready to drink.
title: Herdade do Rocim 2013 Vale de Mata Branco White (Lisboa)

description: This is a rich, wood-aged wine with spice, apricot and ripe plum fruits and a mineral texture. It is rounded as well as fresh, crisp with acidity while full in fruits. Drink this delicious wine now.
title: Casa Santos Lima 2012 Quinta das Amoras Reserva Branco White (Lisboa)

description: A fine and rich blend of Chardonnay and Arinto, this wine has touches of spice and vanilla as well as crisp, bright fruit tones. Citrus and yellow fruit flavors show strongly through the lacy texture of this wine, which has a cool character from the proximity of the vines to the ocean. Drink now.
title: DFJ Vinhos 2013 Quinta do Rocio White (Lisboa)

description: Soft and round, this is a wine that has the warmth of the Alentejo coupled with a tangy, fresh slice of lemon. Blending Antão Vaz, Roupeiro and Perrum, it's a wine to drink now, or just age for a few months.
title: Herdade do Esporão 2013 Monte Velho White (Alentejano)

description: Alvarinho and Sauvignon Blanc in the blend of this wine give it a crisp, herbal freshness that's broadened out by fermentation in new French oak. So it is both fresh and rich, full of citrus as well as yellow fruit flavors. It's still young and should be aged, so drink from 2017.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2014 Vila Santa Reserva Branco White (Alentejano)

description: A blend of Arinto and Antão Vaz, the wine is light, bright and attractively perfumed. It has juicy, tangy character, enhanced by the lemon zest and made richer with the melon fruits. Drink now.
title: Herdade da Comporta 2015 Private Selection White (Península de Setúbal)

description: Perfumed, with a soft, smooth texture, this has flavors of tropical fruit, peach and a hint of lemongrass that make for a rich wine.
title: DFJ Vinhos 2011 Monte Alentejano Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This is a soft, easy wine with the lightest texture and crisp apple and pear flavors. It is gentle and ready to drink.
title: Casca Wines 2015 Cabo da Roca White (Lisboa)

description: Although there was no wood aging, a toasty character gives the wine richness and smooth fruits. Apricot, peach and pear flavors have intensity and ripeness. Drink this wine now and until 2018.
title: Herdade de São Miguel 2012 Ciconia Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This smooth, rich wine shows both ripe fruit and wood aging flavors. It has a mineral texture, plenty of citrus as well as pear and peach flavors, the whole gathered into toastiness. It would benefit from another year, so drink from 2015.
title: Herdade do Rocim 2012 Poento Reserva Branco White (Alentejano)

description: This is a deliciously creamy wine with light white fruits and refreshing acidity. With its cool texture and minerality, it is crisp and zesty and ready to drink.
title: Quinta dos Murças 2016 Assobio Branco White (Douro)

description: The wine, a blend of Antão Vaz, Arinto and Siria, comes from Vidigueira, one of the cooler regions of the Alentejo. That gives the wine its crispness while also allowing it to have a ripe yellow-fruit character. With its spice and final crisp acidity, the wine is ready to drink.
title: Ribafreixo 2016 Pato Frio Selecção White (Alentejano)

description: Green plums and attractive spice combine in this easygoing wine. Its acidity and bright aftertaste emphasize its dry character and its place at the table. Drink now.
title: Casca Wines 2016 Casas White (Douro)

description: A wood-aged wine, with ripe yellow fruits, spice and a smooth, creamy character, kept firmly in place by apple skin texture and a flinty edge.
title: Quinta de la Rosa 2009 Branco White (Douro)

description: A lightly wood aged wine, deliciously fresh and creamy, hinting at smooth Chardonnay-like textures. A light perfume from Malvasia adds piquancy to this attractive, textured wine.
title: Quinta do Filoco 2008 Reserva Branco White (Douro)

description: Fresh and perfumed, this wine offers great citric flavors, a lively crispness rare in white wines from central Portugal. Pear and some yellow fruits give roundness.
title: Quinta da Alorna 2006 White (Ribatejo)

description: One of the most popular Vinho Verdes, this is in a light, medium-sweet style. Very fresh and crisp, with some attractive citrus acidity, and ready to drink now. Screwcap.
title: Aveleda 2012 Casal Garcia Branco White (Vinho Verde)

description: This is a very perfumed wine, with the addition of Moscatel in the blend, adding the lychee flavor. It's textured with a crisp edge that allows the wine to retain its fresh character. This is a wine to be drunk young.
title: Bacalhôa Wines of Portugal 2012 JP Azeitão Branco White (Península de Setúbal)

description: All white fruit, lemon and grapefruit, soft and with a hint of softness. It's a fine apéritif wine, right up front and friendly. Screwcap.
title: Quinta da Alorna 2009 What's for Dinner? Branco White (Tejo)

description: Although this wine was wood-aged, the toast is subtle, smoothing into the creaminess of the ripe yellow fruits. A blend of Chardonnay and Viosinho, this is beautifully textured wine, suggesting aging potential.
title: Quinta de Chocapalha 2008 Reserva Branco White (Lisboa)

description: This blend of Trajadura and Alvarinho comes from the far north of the Vinho Verde region. The wine is cool and perfumed with apricot as well as creamed pear flavors. Drink the wine now.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2016 Blue White (Vinho Verde)

description: Light, bright and fruity this is an easy-to-drink off-dry wine for the summer. It is clean and crisp, apples and pears set off by floral aromas. Drink now.
title: Vinihold 2016 Caiua a Noite White (Vinho Verde)

description: Part of a range of wines that showcases the different styles of Portugal's regions, This wine is smooth, creamily textured and with a warm ripe character. It has pineapple and mango as well as crisper lemon flavors to give a rich wine that is still poised and finely balanced. Drink now.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2016 Azul Portugal White (Palmela)

description: The wine is all tangy zesty fruit. With plenty of apple and grapefruit acidity, it is lively, textured and bright. Drink now.
title: Adega Cooperativa de Borba 2016 Montes Claros Colheita White (Alentejo)

description: This is an attractive fruity wine. With its soft texture, perfumed white fruits and balanced acidity, it is the sort of wine that is ready for a warm day. Drink now.
title: Adega Mãe 2016 Pinta Negra White (Lisboa)

description: A blend of Loureiro, Arinto and Avesso, this light and fruity wine has an edge of prickle along with great acidity and citrus flavors. It is a great summer food wine. Drink now.
title: Casca Wines NV Cascas White (Vinho Verde)

description: Named after the pheasant (Faisão), the wine is crisp enough to be refreshing. It is medium sweet and lightly textured with orange zest. Drink now.
title: Enoport 2016 Faisão White (Vinho Verde)

description: Chardonnay offers the roundness while Fernão Pires offers perfume in this attractive, ready-to-drink wine. It has bright, crisp lemon and green-apple acidity that is immediately appealing. Screwcap.
designation: Tagus Creek Chardonnay and Fernão Pires
title: Falua 2012 Tagus Creek Chardonnay and Fernão Pires White (Tejo)

description: A very herbal wine, with vegetal flavors of celery and asparagus. Citrusy acidity comes through at the end.
title: Quinta de Ventozelo 2010 Cister da Ribeira Branco White (Douro)

description: One of the two estates in the Douro still in the hands of descendants of Dona Antonia Ferreira, who created so many Douro quintas, Vallado is able to produce great white wines as well as reds and Ports. This wood-aged Reserva is smooth, lightly toasty with freshness and citrus as well as pineapple and spice. It will age for several years and will be best from 2016.
title: Quinta do Vallado 2013 Reserva Branco White (Douro)

description: An impressive wood-aged wine that offers a rich, complex series of ripe yellow-fruit flavors, a steely texture and layers of wood toast. It is finely balanced, a wine with great style, spice and final acidity.
title: Niepoort 2010 Redoma Branco White (Douro)

description: Produced from vines aged between 25 and 30 years old, this is a ripe yellow and citrus-flavored wine. It has a strongly mineral edge as well as crisp, tight fruitiness. With its structure and tension, it is likely to age further. Drink from late 2017.
title: Lavradores de Feitoria 2015 Branco White (Douro)

description: With some fermentation in barrel, this wood-touched wine is rounded as well as fruity. Citrus and pineapple flavors give liveliness, with acidity cutting through the spice. Drink now.
title: Parras Wines 2015 Mula Velha Reserva White (Lisboa)

description: This is an attractive, warm, rounded wine. Yellow fruit flavors are cut with white fruit and acidity. It has a smooth, creamy texture that gives it extra richness. Drink now.
title: Valle da Fonte 2015 White (Douro)

description: Produced in eastern Alentejo, near Spain, this light and soft wine is easy and drinkable. It has a smooth texture, just hinting at lemony acidity. Drink now.
title: Global Wines 2015 Monte da Cal Colheita Seleccionada White (Alentejano)

description: This blend of Bical and Cercial is toasty and dominated by its wood aging. Wood-derived spice notes cover its crisper green fruits.
title: Vadio Wines 2015 Vadio Branco White (Bairrada)

description: This soft, light wine boasts crisp fruit and acidity. It has a touch of bitterness, with almond and tight citrus flavors, and is ready to drink.
title: Casal do Conde 2015 Galileu White (Tejo)

description: Partially aged in oak, this wine is crisp, juicy and bright with citrus and acidity. Apples and pears come through strongly in this attractive wine that is ready to drink.
title: Quanta Terra 2014 Terra a Terra Reserva Branco White (Douro)

description: This blend of Fernão Pires, Arinto, Sauvignon Blanc and, unusually, Marsanne is ripe, with a deliciously perfumed character. Acidity and bright fruit give crispness that contrasts with the rich texture. Drink from 2018.
title: Quinta da Alorna 2016 Vinho Branco White (Tejo)

description: This soft wine is a blend of two local white grapes: Síria and Fonte Cal. Intense acidity and a cool-climate feel from the high- altitude vineyards make this crisp, with grapefruit and lemon flavors. Drink now.
title: Rui Roboredo Madeira 2016 Beyra Branco White (Beira Interior)

description: Lightly wood aged, this wine is soft and creamy. It has a touch of spice as well as lively lemon and orange-zest flavors, with a crisp tang of acidity at the end. Drink now.
title: Parras Wines 2015 Quinta do Gradil Branco White (Lisboa)

description: Very aromatic, this has flavors of lychee and lemon. It has a spicy feel to it, giving it a soft, rounded texture. Ready to drink.
title: Barros 2011 White (Douro)
